mapper.select: SELECT id, create_time createTime, amount, sn, _status `status` FROM flb.refund_order WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1 FOR UPDATE

SELECT r.id id,r.create_time createTime,r.amount amount,p.sn paymentOrderSn FROM flb.refund_order r LEFT JOIN flb.consumption_order c ON r.consume_order_id = c.id LEFT JOIN flb.payment_order p ON c.payment_order_id = p.id WHERE r._status = 'DTK' ORDER BY r.create_time LIMIT 300
